An innovative NFC-based smart shopping system designed to help elderly people with visual impairment. Using NFC (Near Field Communication) technology, users can access product information through their smartphones with enhanced font sizes, color contrast, and clear labeling. The system combines AI and NFC technology to make healthy eating, elderly-friendly shopping, and environmental sustainability easier and more accessible. projects.title: WICO Korea World Invention Creativity Competition
projects.description:
Our talented students - Hung Yin (5A), Yu Tsz Hang (5A), Wong Ngo Hin (5A), Yip Wang Ban (4A), and Chow Ching Kiu (4A) - traveled to Seoul, Korea during summer vacation to participate in the WICO World Invention Creativity Competition. This prestigious international competition attracted teams from various countries, providing an excellent opportunity for cross-cultural exchange and innovation sharing.

After thorough preparation, both teams presented their innovative projects to the judges, successfully demonstrating their designs and functionalities. Despite acknowledging areas for improvement, they left a strong impression on the judges with their creativity and technical skills.
